languages.text: "Ты человек в городе друкари. Такое кого угодно сломает. Но посмотри — Глейто привел меня к тебе, и я вытащу нас отсюда. Ты рано отчаиваешься".
"You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."
languages.original_text: "Ты человек в городе друкари. Такое кого угодно сломает. Но посмотри — Глейто привел меня к тебе, и я вытащу нас отсюда. Ты рано отчаиваешься".

traits.locale_text: "You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."
"You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."
"You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."
"You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."
"You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."

languages.text: 「君はデュカーリにいるただの人間だ。それだけで、誰だって心が折れる。だが、グライトが君のもとへ導いてくれた。必ずここから君を連れ出す。希望を捨てるのはまだ早い」
languages.original_text: "You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."

traits.locale_text: 「君はデュカーリにいるただの人間だ。それだけで、誰だって心が折れる。だが、グライトが君のもとへ導いてくれた。必ずここから君を連れ出す。希望を捨てるのはまだ早い」

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein Mensch in einer Stadt der Drukhari. Darunter kann jeder zerbrechen. Aber Glaito hat mich zu Euch geführt, und ich werde uns hier rausbringen. Ihr habt die Hoffnung zu früh aufgegeben."
languages.original_text: "You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein Mensch in einer Stadt der Drukhari. Darunter kann jeder zerbrechen. Aber Glaito hat mich zu Euch geführt, und ich werde uns hier rausbringen. Ihr habt die Hoffnung zu früh aufgegeben."

languages.text: « Vous êtes un humain dans une ville de Drukharis. Cela suffirait à briser n'importe qui. Mais Glaito m'a {mf|guidé|guidée} jusqu'à vous, et nous allons nous sortir d'ici. Vous avez renoncé trop vite. »
languages.original_text: "You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes un humain dans une ville de Drukharis. Cela suffirait à briser n'importe qui. Mais Glaito m'a {mf|guidé|guidée} jusqu'à vous, et nous allons nous sortir d'ici. Vous avez renoncé trop vite. »

languages.text: «Es usted un ser humano en una ciudad Drukhari; cualquiera se vendría abajo. Pero Glaito me ha conducido hasta usted, y ahora voy a sacarnos de aquí. Renunció a la esperanza demasiado pronto».
languages.original_text: "You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."

traits.locale_text: «Es usted un ser humano en una ciudad Drukhari; cualquiera se vendría abajo. Pero Glaito me ha conducido hasta usted, y ahora voy a sacarnos de aquí. Renunció a la esperanza demasiado pronto».

languages.text: “这里是黑暗灵族的城市，而你却是一介人类，这足以摧垮任何人的心灵。格雷托带着我找到了你，我准备带所有人离开这里。现在放弃，恐怕太早了。”
languages.original_text: "You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."

traits.locale_text: “这里是黑暗灵族的城市，而你却是一介人类，这足以摧垮任何人的心灵。格雷托带着我找到了你，我准备带所有人离开这里。现在放弃，恐怕太早了。”

languages.text: "Burası Drukhari şehri, sense bir insansın. Kim olsa mahvolurdu. Ancak Glaito beni sana getirdi. Ben de bizi buradan çıkaracağım. Umudundan çok çabuk vazgeçtin."
languages.original_text: "You are a human in a city of Drukhari. It is enough to break anyone. But Glaito led me to you, and I am going to get us out of here. You gave up hope too soon."

traits.locale_text: "Burası Drukhari şehri, sense bir insansın. Kim olsa mahvolurdu. Ancak Glaito beni sana getirdi ve ben de bizi buradan çıkaracağım. Umudundan fazla erken vazgeçtin."
